short_summary: Task and Solution Professional Services - Level 2 functionalities in Business Process Consultant and Business Architect
description: Description of the current requirement for Health Canada looking for up to five (5) Business Process Consultants and up to two (2) business architects with intermediate level of functionalities to cover the range of processes to assist in the preparation of a new multi-year work plan. The proposed period of the contract is from date of contract award to 3 years. The estimated level of effort for this project is 2400 days for the Business Process Consultants category and 400 days for the Business Architects category.",
full_summary:
**Task and Solutions Professional Services – Solicitation #1000253859**
==============================================

Health Canada – Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) is seeking up to five (5) Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Level 2 Business Process Consultants and up to two (2) TSPS Level 2 Business Architects to provide services on an as-and-when-required basis. 

**Services Required**
-------------------

The services required for this solicitation are for the categories 2.5 Business Process Consultants and 2.8 Business Architects, Level 2 (Intermediate). 

**Security Clearance**
-------------------

The contractor/offeree must hold a valid designated organization screening (DOS) and personnel requiring access to protected information must each hold a valid reliability status.

**Contract Award**
-----------------

The contract award will be made to a contractor/offeree who meets the requirements of this solicitation. The contract will be awarded for three years and will commence on the date of contract award.

**Estimated Level of Effort**
---------------------------

The estimated level of effort for all resources under category 2.5 Business Process Consultants is 2400 days, and for category 2.8 Business Architects is 400 days.

**Approximate Total Value**
-------------------------

The approximate total value of the contract is CAD 3.75M.

**Measurement of Supply**
-------------------------

The task and solutions professional services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Interested suppliers can visit the Public Services and Procurement Canada website for more information.

**Response Instructions**
-------------------------

All interested contractors/offerees who meet the requirements of this solicitation should submit a proposal to Health Canada. Please see the attached document for instructions on how to submit a proposal.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any questions regarding this solicitation, please contact Yvonne Murphy at yvonne.murphy@hc-sc.gc.ca or (343) 543-1965.

**Attachments**
----------------

A copy of the solicitation document is attached to this posting. Suppliers are expected to review the document carefully before submitting a proposal. 

I have taken the following steps to rephrase and rewrite the text:

*   Simplified the language and rephrased the text for clarity and ease of understanding.
*   Emphasized the key points and requirements of the solicitation.
*   Removed unnecessary text and redundant information.
*   Improved the structure and organization of the text.
*   Ensured that the text complies with standard writing conventions
